forest_goblin_1.name: Forest Goblin
forest_goblin_1.description: A small, mischievous creature with green skin and sharp teeth. They often lurk in wooded areas.

forest_goblin_2.name: Forest Goblin
forest_goblin_2.description: Another forest goblin, this one appears slightly more aggressive.

cave_goblin_guard.name: Cave Goblin Guard
cave_goblin_guard.description: A slightly larger goblin, equipped with crude leather armor and a rusty shield. It guards the cave entrance.

goblin_king.name: Goblin King
goblin_king.description: A hulking, scarred goblin with a fierce demeanor, adorned with stolen trinkets and wielding a large, jagged sword. He is the leader of the goblin cave.

dire_wolf.name: Dire Wolf
dire_wolf.description: A massive, fearsome wolf with glowing red eyes. Its teeth are like daggers.

forest_spider_1.name: Forest Spider
forest_spider_1.description: A large, hairy spider with venomous fangs. It waits patiently in its web.
